christmas-Death.NAME: Disaster - Death
christmas-Death.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. If kills enemy, deal damage again to a random enemy with extra !M! time.

christmas-Famine.NAME: Disaster - Famine
christmas-Famine.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Heal half the unblocked damage made. If Fatal, gain !M! Max HP.

christmas-Plague.NAME: Disaster - Plague
christmas-Plague.DESCRIPTION: Gain 5 Noxious Fumes. When you receive Attack damage, make the enemy's Poison affects !M! times.

christmas-War.NAME: Disaster - War
christmas-War.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply an AOE damage, repeat !M! times.

christmas-GiftDamaged.NAME: Christmas Gift - Damaged
christmas-GiftDamaged.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw Status, Exhaust it and add !M! random Christmas Gift into your hand. Christmas Gift cost 0. Whenever you play a Christmas Gift, Exhaust it.

christmas-GiftDisturb.NAME: Christmas Gift - Disturb
christmas-GiftDisturb.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses X Strength, apply X-1 Weak and Vulnerable. If it has Artifact, apply 1 Weak again.
christmas-GiftDisturb.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses X+1 Strength, apply X Weak and Vulnerable. If it has Artifact, apply 1 Weak again.

christmas-GiftExplosion.NAME: Christmas Gift - Explosion
christmas-GiftExplosion.DESCRIPTION: Gain a 3 tier Bomb every !M! turns.

christmas-GiftHypnosis.NAME: Christmas Gift - Hypnosis
christmas-GiftHypnosis.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Add !M! Void into Discard Pile. End your turn and start your next turn.

christmas-GiftInfinite.NAME: Christmas Gift - Infinite
christmas-GiftInfinite.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add !M! random Christmas Gift into your hand.
christmas-GiftInfinite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add !M! random Upgraded Christmas Gift into your hand.

christmas-GiftIron.NAME: Christmas Gift - Iron
christmas-GiftIron.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. If kills enemy, add !M! random Upgraded Christmas Gift into your hand.

christmas-GiftKakaa.NAME: Christmas Gift - Kakaa
christmas-GiftKakaa.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Power, gain !M! Strength.
christmas-GiftKakaa.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Power, gain !M! Strength. At the start of your turn, gain !M! Strength.

christmas-GiftLuck.NAME: Christmas Gift - Luck
christmas-GiftLuck.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. Add !M! to !M! +2 random Christmas Gift into your hand, for each, add a Dazed into Discard Pile. Exhaust.
christmas-GiftLuck.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. Add !M! to !M! +2 random Upgraded Christmas Gift into your hand, for each, add a Dazed into Discard Pile. Exhaust.

christmas-GiftMagic.NAME: Christmas Gift - Magic
christmas-GiftMagic.DESCRIPTION: Fills all your potion slots with random potion. Ethereal.
christmas-GiftMagic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fills all your potion slots with random potion.

christmas-GiftVoid.NAME: Christmas Gift - Void
christmas-GiftVoid.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Void into Discard Pile. Exhaust. Ethereal.
